Html.name: Html0
Html.content:
Note that the containers exposed by the template rows have different permission restrictions: header and footer can only be filled by template developers.

Having the above basic layout, you can move onto adding layout rows. For header and footer a template developer could add layout rows where again only template developers can add contents. In the template row for the content, all template developers and editors can add layout rows (where only template developers can create new such rows). Element authors cannot add layout rows. They do not see the corresponding element view. For example, the page could look as shown in the figure below after layout rows have been added.
